post:
Hello Let people , 

today we offer this cupon code (recurring for life time)  : "SSDPLAN550OFF" wich is valid until 30.06.2017 or for the first 100 customers (what first occurred) and is apply 50% reduction from the normal price in any our ssd plans (pure ssd).

If you are interesed please [click here](https://www.hostsolutions.ro/eng/hosting/virtual-private-server-vps-ssd)

The principal network in this offer is UPC (liberty global)

Also we have this cupon code (recurring for life time) : "ThanksLETpeople" wich is 30% off the price from our normal prices , you can use this cupon code in any of this plans if you pay quarently : [Cheap Dedicated Servers in Romania](https://www.hostsolutions.ro/eng/hosting/dedicated-servers-romania)

The principal network in this offer is UPC (liberty global)

To mention the first plan in budget server is came with dual processor and 8 gb ram instead of what is write in the page. (free upgrade from our part)


Thanks all ,
Marius
